name: part_004
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#夏色FullBloom ⧸ 夏色まつり誕生ライブ【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [pKc5qSSWJQs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Ima-yoi wa Halloween Night!' (Tonight is Halloween Night!).
Cinematic visual transition from a Halloween-themed castle to a snowy winter castle setting.
Solo performance of the song 'Shiroi Yuki no Princess wa' (The Snow White Princess is).
